channel.title: Comments on: Decorated Sugar Cookies – Daring Bakers Challenge September 2010

item.title: By: Mei Sze
item.dc:creator: Mei Sze
item.description: Ooooooo...pretty pretty sugar cookies...I missed this and October's challenge :( Was away in October for my wedding anniverary and then got way too busy to update my blog but thanks for the 'flooding' tip on the icing..I've never really worked with this style of icing before; usually i just get a slab of sugar paste and roll it out....will need to practice piping out some pretty patterns... thanks~!
item.content:encoded:
Ooooooo…pretty pretty sugar cookies…I missed this and October’s challenge üôÅ Was away in October for my wedding anniverary and then got way too busy to update my blog but thanks for the ‘flooding’ tip on the icing..I’ve never really worked with this style of icing before; usually i just get a slab of sugar paste and roll it out….will need to practice piping out some pretty patterns…
thanks~!

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
I always love the combination of vivid yellow and red. They are just so compatible.... and these cokies are just exquisite!
Sawadee from Bangkok, Kris
item.content:encoded:
I always love the combination of vivid yellow and red. They are just so compatible…. and these cokies are just exquisite!

Sawadee from Bangkok,
Kris

item.title: By: Gourmet Chick
item.dc:creator: Gourmet Chick
item.description: Wow those cookies are the most perfect cookies I have ever seen - incredible! Beautiful flowers as well.
item.content:encoded: Wow those cookies are the most perfect cookies I have ever seen – incredible! Beautiful flowers as well.

item.title: By: Nadia
item.dc:creator: Nadia
item.description: love the photography and ofcourse cookies

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I love the smell of sweet peas and freesias! Your orchids are gorgeous. My favourite cookies are your marbly ones, but the hearts are cute too!
item.content:encoded: I love the smell of sweet peas and freesias! Your orchids are gorgeous. My favourite cookies are your marbly ones, but the hearts are cute too!

item.title: By: Sara @ Belly Rumbles
item.dc:creator: Sara @ Belly Rumbles
item.description: I love your colour combinations, they look gorgeous.
item.content:encoded: I love your colour combinations, they look gorgeous.

item.title: By: Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: Wow..your cookies are so bright and beautifully decorated..such a smooth perfect royal icing. Well done!!
item.content:encoded: Wow..your cookies are so bright and beautifully decorated..such a smooth perfect royal icing. Well done!!

item.title: By: Kara@butterheartssugar
item.dc:creator: Kara@butterheartssugar
item.description: Very cute little cookies, I love the bright colours. Your garden is amazing, I have the same purple daises growing crazy everywhere. Gosh I love spring!
item.content:encoded: Very cute little cookies, I love the bright colours. Your garden is amazing, I have the same purple daises growing crazy everywhere. Gosh I love spring!

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Your cookis looks great, really colourfull and artistic.:)))))))))
item.content:encoded: Your cookis looks great, really colourfull and artistic.:)))))))))

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Great marbling work! Your cookies look fantastic!
item.content:encoded: Great marbling work! Your cookies look fantastic!
